Name: Brent Oil Prices
Summary: Daily historical Brent Oil Prices available on the U.S. Energy Information Admin.

Sections.Title: Dataset Information
Sections.Content: The crude oil price movements are subject to diverse influencing factors. This dataset was retrieved from the U.S. Energy Information Administration: Europe Brent Spot Price FOB (Dollars per Barrel)

Sections.Title: Content
Sections.Content: The aim of this dataset and work is to predict future Crude Oil Prices based on the historical data available in the dataset. The data contains daily Brent oil prices from 17th of May 1987 until the 13th of November 2022.
